text: Malacoscylus fasciatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Galileo and Martins in 1998. It is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Malacoscylus fasciatus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1998
title: Malacoscylus fasciatus
